description: She's a real princess who rules the casa with love, grace and fancy penmanship. A casual italic calligraphy inspired style perfect for titling with a little flair. Designed by Crystal Kluge of Tart Workshop (a DBA of Font Diner, Inc). To contribute to the project contact the Font Diner at support@fontdiner.com
